explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper uses clustering techniques to group clients based on their portfolio returns and demographic data, which is a form of unsupervised learning.
explanations.clustering: The paper explicitly mentions using k-prototypes clustering to group clients into six categories based on their portfolio performances and other factors.
explanations.principal components analysis: The paper employs functional principal component analysis to discover underlying variations in observed client returns, which is a key part of the methodology.
